description:
In checkin:
http://bazaar.launchpad.net/~hudson-openstack/nova/trunk/revision/1188.4.1

Logic was added to not use instance_id but instead to generate a hostname from the display name of an instance.

This is broken in a couple of different ways:
1. Since there is not way to set display name with euca tools, for a normal usecase you would get the "default behavior"
2. The default behavior generates invalid hostnames.

The code changes all characters to lower case and replaces all " " with "_".  However, in most unixes "_" is an invalid character for a hostname.  

On ubuntu cloud-init this makes it so the setting of the hostname at boot time fails.
title: Generating hostname from display name incorrect
